# bounds

**Instance Property**

The bounds of the item.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var bounds: CGRect { get set }
```

## Discussion

When setting the bounds, the origin of the bounds rectangle must always be at (0, 0). Changing the bounds rectangle also changes the value in the [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UICollectionViewLayoutAttributes/size] property to match the new bounds size.

## Accessing the layout attributes

- **frame**: The frame rectangle of the item.
- **center**: The center point of the item.
- **size**: The size of the item.
- **transform3D**: The 3D transform of the item.
- **transform**: The affine transform of the item.
- **alpha**: The transparency of the item.
- **zIndex**: Specifies the item’s position on the z axis.
- **isHidden**: Determines whether the item is currently displayed.
